notes.text: comp.FilterBar: Buttons are now visible on 320px screen size
FlexibilityDelegate: Fields with Common.Text only should be included
DateRangeType: correctly set async created operations as value
SmartField: Binding context for fixed-value scenarios is now synchronized
SmartTable: showDetails is now persisted after settings dialog is opened
We've now fixed the issue where the backend call was null for smartMultiInput
